cast.overview: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.
cast.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

cast.original_title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
cast.overview: Harley Quinn joins forces with a singer, an assassin and a police detective to help a young girl who had a hit placed on her after she stole a rare diamond from a crime lord.
cast.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)

crew.original_title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
crew.overview: Harley Quinn joins forces with a singer, an assassin and a police detective to help a young girl who had a hit placed on her after she stole a rare diamond from a crime lord.
crew.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)

crew.overview: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.
crew.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

crew.overview: Taking place during the events of John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum, Eve Macarro begins her training in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma.
crew.title: Ballerina

crew.overview: Armed with only one word - Tenet - and fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
crew.title: Tenet

crew.overview: After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap, seven disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts.
crew.title: Thunderbolts*

details.biography: Caleb Spillyards was brought up in the foothills of the Ozarks in Maumelle, Arkansas, which reflects his love as a true adventurist. The avid outdoorsman got his start in gymnastics at an early age, which fueled his passion for performance. As a ten-time state champion, the Junior Olympic competitor graduated from Oak Grove High School, where he discovered his knack for music and singing. Out of high school, Caleb signed to his first record label as singer/bassist for popular rock band School Boy Humor. He spent years touring, writing, producing albums and videos, and living the musician's fantasy. After an exciting and unpredictable career as a musician, he demanded more as a performer. He moved to New Orleans after recognising his natural gift for acting and directing through his involvement with several indie films around the country.
details.name: Caleb Spillyards
